main event: Observation of a shining object with a long tail was reported in Helsinki, Finland on 3 January 1948.
interesting points: The object was described as shining and moving west to east, The object was visible for about 30 seconds, Reports indicate another shining object was seen in Piitarsaari on 5 January, Finnish press began using the term flying saucers to reference light phenomena, The phenomenon was reported to have left gray streaks in the sky.
witness description: Helsinki press reported multiple eyewitnesses but specific details were not provided.
